title: Implement Image Recognition API for VitaTrack Food Identification
instruction: Create image recognition API integration for VitaTrack food identification and logging. Implement food image analysis, portion size estimation, and nutrition calculation from photos. Setup integration with computer vision services (AWS Rekognition, Google Vision), custom food recognition models, and image preprocessing pipelines. Include confidence scoring, manual correction workflows, and continuous learning from user feedback. Implement batch processing, real-time analysis, and offline capability preparation.
